content: in this legal case two parties bpbd and pb were involved in a dispute over ownership of an industrial factory in messina initially db sued pb claiming coownership of the building and requesting its division however pb objected to the division arguing that it would negatively impact the propertys value due to existing lease and financing contracts the court initially granted the division but pb appealed the decision after considering the arguments from both parties the court of appeals in messina ruled in favor of pb assigning full ownership of the factory to them pb was also ordered to pay db a specified amount of money the court determined that dividing the property would be costly and diminish its value the courts decision was made on march 3 2005 and the president judge of the court upheld the ruling
